short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: YouTube Auto HD: YouTube automatically adjusts video quality, manages subtitles and audio settings.
short.cs: Upravuje kvalitu videa, spravuje titulky a zvuk. Auto HD, přizpůsobení rychlosti internetu pro YouTube.
short.da: Justerer videokvalitet, styrer undertekster og lyd. Auto HD, internethastighed tilpasning for YouTube.
short.de: YouTube Auto HD: Passt automatisch die Videoqualität an, verwaltet Untertitel und Audioeinstellungen auf YouTube.
short.el: Προσαρμόζει την ποιότητα βίντεο, διαχειρίζεται υπότιτλους και ήχο. Αυτόματο HD για το YouTube.
short.es: YouTube Auto HD: Ajusta automáticamente la calidad del video, gestiona subtítulos y configuración de audio en YouTube.
short.fi: Säätää videon laatua, hallitsee tekstityksiä ja ääntä. Auto HD, internet-nopeuden mukautus YouTubelle.
short.fr: YouTube Auto HD : Ajuste automatiquement la qualité vidéo, gère les sous-titres et les paramètres audio sur YouTube.
short.hu: Beállítja a videó minőségét, kezeli a feliratokat és a hangot. Auto HD, internetsebesség-alkalmazkodás YouTube-hoz.
short.it: YouTube Auto HD: Regola automaticamente la qualità video, gestisce i sottotitoli e le impostazioni audio su YouTube.
short.ja: YouTube Auto HD：YouTubeの動画品質を自動調整し、字幕と音声設定を管理します。
short.nl: Optimaliseert videokwaliteit, beheert ondertitels en audio. Auto HD, internetsnelheid aanpassing en videokwaliteitscontrole voor…
short.no: Justerer videokvalitet, administrerer undertekster og lyd. Auto HD, internetthastighetstilpasning for YouTube.
short.pl: Automatycznie dostosowuje jakość wideo, zarządza napisami i dźwiękiem. Auto HD i optymalizacja dla YouTube.
short.ro: Ajustează calitatea video, gestionează subtitrările și setările audio. HD automat pentru YouTube.
short.ru: YouTube Auto HD: Автоматически настраивает качество видео, управляет субтитрами и аудионастройками на YouTube.
short.sv: Justerar videokvalitet, hanterar undertexter och ljud. Auto HD, internethastighetsanpassning för YouTube.
short.tr: YouTube Otomatik HD: YouTube'da video kalitesini otomatik olarak ayarlar, altyazı ve ses ayarlarını yönetir.
short.zh_CN: YouTube自动高清：自动调整YouTube视频质量，管理字幕和音频设置。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Auto HD is a powerful Chrome extension that automatically optimizes your YouTube experience. 

YouTube Auto HD here are its key features:

🎥 Auto Quality Adjustment: Selects the optimal video quality based on your internet speed.
🔧 Manual Quality Control: Set your preferred quality manually if desired.
📊 Adaptive Performance: Automatically adjusts video quality as your internet speed changes.
🌐 Subtitle Management: Automatically enables subtitles in your preferred language.
🔊 Audio Control: Offers automatic volume adjustment and mute mode features.
📈 Viewing Statistics: Tracks your total watch time and quality changes.

YouTube Auto HD is designed to maximize every video watching experience. Whether you have a fast or slow internet connection, this extension picks the best quality for you, so you can focus solely on the content.

With its user-friendly interface, you can customize your settings, enable manual quality selection, or switch to fully automatic mode. Set your subtitle and audio preferences once, and let the extension handle the rest!

Try Auto YouTube HD now for a smoother, higher quality, and personalized viewing experience on YouTube!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How It Works:

🔌 1. Install the YouTube Auto HD extension from the Chrome Web Store.
🎥 2. Navigate to any YouTube video page.
🚀 3. The extension automatically detects your internet speed and sets the optimal video quality.
🎛️ 4. Use the extension popup to manually select quality or adjust settings if you prefer.
🍿 5. Sit back and enjoy your videos in the best possible quality!

Advanced Features:

🔄 Automatic quality adjustment every 30 seconds
🌍 Subtitle language preferences applied automatically
🔊 Seamless audio settings management
📊 View your watching statistics in the extension popup
🏆 YouTube Auto HD works silently in the background, ensuring you always get the best viewing experience without any hassle. Whether you're a casual viewer or a Auto YouTube HD enthusiast, this extension is designed to enhance your viewing experience effortlessly.

⬇️ Download YouTube Auto HD now and transform your YouTube watching experience!
